title: Apple Reports Record Q1 Revenue Despite Supply Chain Challenges
summary: Apple Inc. exceeded Wall Street expectations with record quarterly revenue of $123.9 billion, driven by strong iPhone 15 sales and services growth.

title: Apple Vision Pro Launch Sees Strong Initial Demand
summary: Pre-orders for Apple's new mixed reality headset exceed 200,000 units in first weekend, signaling strong consumer interest in AR/VR technology.

title: Alphabet's AI Investments Drive Cloud Revenue Growth
summary: Google Cloud revenue surges 35% year-over-year as enterprises adopt AI-powered solutions and generative AI tools.

title: Google Announces Major Breakthrough in Quantum Computing
summary: Google's quantum computer achieves 'quantum supremacy' milestone, potentially revolutionizing cryptography and drug discovery.

title: Microsoft Azure Revenue Accelerates on AI Demand
summary: Azure cloud services grow 30% as businesses rush to implement AI capabilities, with Copilot adoption exceeding expectations.

title: Microsoft Announces Major Acquisition in Gaming Sector
summary: Microsoft Gaming division expands with strategic acquisition, strengthening Xbox Game Pass content library.

title: Tesla Cybertruck Production Ramps Up Ahead of Schedule
summary: Tesla achieves monthly production target of 10,000 Cybertrucks, reducing delivery wait times significantly.

title: Tesla Supercharger Network Opens to All EVs Nationwide
summary: Tesla completes rollout of universal charging access, potentially generating $2B in annual revenue from non-Tesla vehicles.
